turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you help me order pizza for my family for dinner tonight?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, where would you like me to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Fire Slice Pizza in Amarillo

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is that the one located at 7306 SW 34th Street?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that's the one with the best pizza in town.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sounds delicious. How many pizzas do you need?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need three medium pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Fire Slice doesn't serve medium pizzas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh, that's right. Make it three large pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, what kind of pizzas do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need one pepperoni, one cheese, and one Hawaiian pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They don't have a pizza called Hawaiian. Do you mean the Hula pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I think that's right. What is on it?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: marinara with three cheese blend, ham, and pineapple.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's correct. I need one of those.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You would like a large in that type, correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, a large for all three kinds.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like any breadsticks today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like any side salads?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, we already have salad at home.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Can I order any drinks for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, I don't need any drinks or anything else today.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, I have an order for 1 large cheese pizza, 1 large pepperoni pizza, and 1 large Hula pizza. Your total is $58.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect. Thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: How would you like to pay?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I have account information on file. Please use that.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great. Your receipt will be sent to your mobile device in a text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you. Is the order complete?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, your order is complete, and your pizza will be ready to pick up in 25 minutes.
